verses.roman:
āmāra mātṛ-svasā-gṛha--nirjana sthāna
tāhāṅ vāsā deha, kara sarva samādhāna'

synonyms: āmāra—my; mātṛ-svasā—of the aunt; gṛha—the home; nirjana sthāna—very solitary place; tāhāṅ—there; vāsā—an apartment; deha—give; kara—make; sarva—all; samādhāna—arrangements.
translation: "Also, the apartment belonging to my maternal aunt is in a very solitary place. Make all arrangements for Him to stay there."
